Variable Documentation

GtkListStore* completion_model
 

Stores options for autocompleting search entries.

handles the autocompletion functionality when entering search strings (search and select parts dialog).
list contains only the designators and comments in contrast to parsed_PNP_data, which holds all 11 columns of a pick and place file.

See also:
parsed_PNP_data
